snippet.title: Dyna Bomb 2 Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Dyna Bomb 2 - Sequel to the famous Dyna Bomb offers everything new in Summer  2022. Available for Nintendo Switch, Playstation 4 / 5, Xbox One and Xbox Series X|S
Over 60 levels spread across 8 worlds and then 1 hidden world and levels
Each world has a fantastic theme, bosses, enemies and lots of fun.
Single player or a special local co-op mode.  Yes it's a couch co-op mode which will add lots of replay value. 

Awesome soundtracks by Ray Norrish - Yes, the famous musician since Amiga days!

We hope you enjoy playing the game.

A game created from the heart of the 7 Raven Studios team!
#NintendoSwitch
#Playstation
#Xbox
